title: Do you know why the will is damaged or has marks?
question: Do you know why the will is damaged or has marks?
hint: If you know why staples were removed from the will, for example, you should tell us as this will reduce delays in processing your application.
willDamageReasonDescriptionTitle: Explain why the will is damaged or has marks

willDamageReasonKnown.required: Select ‘yes’ if you know why the will is damaged or has marks

willDamageReasonDescription.required: Enter the reason why the will is damaged or has marks
